persons: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
subject: Horses
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Queen Elizabeth II celebrated her first Royal Ascot victory since 1999 when her horse Free Agent won the Chesham Stakes on Saturday. Richard Hughes rode the 7-2 co-favorite from last to a two-and-a-quarter-length victory in Ascot, England.
snippet: Queen Elizabeth II celebrated her first Royal Ascot victory since 1999 when her horse Free Agent won the Chesham Stakes on Saturday. Richard Hughes rode the 7-2 co-favorite from last to a two-and-a-quarter-length victory in Ascot, England.
